author: graymattr
title: Big Red Brick!
review:
This free set was available at LEGO Brand Stores during in-store events to celebrate the "90 Years of Play" anniversary of the company.  This was the first store buildable event that I bothered to attend since they are aimed at children.  However, this buildable red brick makes a nice little display on my desk.  I especially like that it has a base under the brick to give it a more presentable finish.

The base is 8x8 and the brick is 6x6 studs wide and 4 bricks tall.  The 1949/1950 version of the bricks had a slot which is faithfully represented in this model.  If you missed the store event, this is made up of very basic pieces so you can create your own using the instructions here on Brickset!
